message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something truly valuable. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to consider that?

I'm still not willing to go below $11000, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll offer you the product for $10500. It's the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. Would you be willing to consider that?

I've made concessions, but I'm not willing to go below $10500. I'll offer you the product for $10250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I understand you're willing to go down to $10250, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. Would you be willing to consider that?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to give up much more. I'll offer you the product for $10125. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
